bill_title: effect certain provisions of the Criminal Code Revision Commission bill.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to effect certain provisions of the Criminal Code Revision Commission bill. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-23 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: For purposes of this chapter, the term, vehicle, as defined in subdivision 32-14-1(37) does not include bicycles, any other nonmotorized vehicles, and ridden animals. 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
